readability.assessment: Flesch-Kincaid Grade: 36.9, Gunning Fog: 37.6. The content is complex for a general audience. Long sentences may reduce clarity.
suggestions: Break sentences longer than 15 words into shorter ones, e.g., 'Use our tools. Improve your results.'

structure.assessment: Page has 72 headings, 60 paragraphs, and 97 lists.

style.assessment: The tone is generally clear. Some sentences are too long, reducing readability.
suggestions: Shorten long sentences, e.g., split 'Executive Education Certification Course...' into shorter parts.
